mapper.select: SELECT ISU_NO ISU_NO , SRT_DT SRT_DT , END_DT END_DT , ITT_INTRAT ITT_INTRAT , ACNT_INTRAT ACNt_INTRAT , FIRM_NO FIRM_NO , CMSN_RAT CMSN_RAT FROM WM_TBF_MMWINTRAT WHERE ISU_NO = #{in.zIsuNo} AND SRT_DT BETWEEN #{in.zQrySrtDt} AND #{in.zQryEndDt} /* ORDER BY ISU_NO, SRT_DT */

SELECT ISU_NO ISU_NO , SRT_DT SRT_DT , END_DT END_DT , ITT_INTRAT ITT_INTRAT , ACNT_INTRAT ACNt_INTRAT , FIRM_NO FIRM_NO , CMSN_RAT CMSN_RAT FROM WM_TBF_MMWINTRAT WHERE ISU_NO = #{in.zIsuNo} AND SRT_DT BETWEEN #{in.zQrySrtDt} AND #{in.zQryEndDt} /* ORDER BY ISU_NO, SRT_DT */
